main_definition: Intention refers to a person's plan, purpose, or objective in doing something.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A goal or aim that one plans to achieve through actions or decisions.
meanings_and_examples.example: Her intention was to start her own business by the end of the year.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The mental state in which a person is aware and prepared to act towards achieving a certain outcome.
meanings_and_examples.example: His intention when entering the room was not to upset anyone.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An unspoken understanding or agreement between people, often indicating what they think will happen next.
meanings_and_examples.example: She looked at him with her eyes wide open, but he had no intention of giving up his spot in the race.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The underlying motive behind a person's actions or words.
meanings_and_examples.example: His apology seemed insincere; it was clear that his true intention was not to make amends but to avoid trouble.
